00013 #include <libport/debug.hh>
00014 #include <libport/format.hh>
00015 #include <urbi/uimage.hh>
00016 
00017 #define cardinality_of(Array) (sizeof (Array) / sizeof (*(Array)))
00018 
00019 GD_CATEGORY(UValue);
00020 
00021 namespace urbi
00022 {
00023 
00024   /*---------------.
00025   | UImageFormat.  |
00026   `---------------*/
00027 
00028   static const char* formats[] =
00029   {
00030     "image_unknown",
00031     "rgb",
00032     "YCbCr",
00033     "jpeg",
00034     "ppm",
00035     "YUV422",
00036     "grey8",
00037     "grey4",
00038       "yuv411_planar",
00039   };
00040 
00041   const char*
00042   format_string(UImageFormat f)
00043   {
00044     if (f < 0 || int(cardinality_of(formats)) <= f)
00045     {
00046       GD_FERROR("invalid UImageFormat value: %d", f);
00047       f = IMAGE_UNKNOWN;
00048     }
00049     return formats[f];
00050   }
00051 
00052   UImageFormat
00053   parse_image_format(const std::string& s)
00054   {
00055     for (unsigned i = 0; i < cardinality_of(formats); ++i)
00056       if (s == formats[i])
00057         return static_cast<UImageFormat>(i);
00058     return IMAGE_UNKNOWN;
00059   }
00060 
00061   /*---------.
00062   | UImage.  |
00063   `---------*/
00064 
00065   UImage
00066   UImage::make()
00067   {
00068     UImage res;
00069     res.data = 0;
00070     res.size = res.width = res.height = 0;
00071     res.imageFormat = IMAGE_UNKNOWN;
00072     return res;
00073   }
00074 
00075   const char*
00076   UImage::format_string() const
00077   {
00078     return ::urbi::format_string(imageFormat);
00079   }
00080 
00081   std::string
00082   UImage::headers_() const
00083   {
00084     return libport::format("%s %s %s",
00085                            format_string(), width, height);
00086   }
00087 
00088 } // namespace urbi
